name: Growth Chart Ruler: Rustic Walnut
description:
This growth-chart ruler provides a tangible way to watch your little one grow on a classic and portable piece of decor. With a gender-neutral appearance, this piece can be proudly displayed anywhere in your home or given as a sentimental gift. 

This listing is for Rustic Walnut, a darker colored board providing a timeless addition to any home.  Four other colors are available.

Each growth-chart ruler is constructed from 100% pine - hand selected, sanded and stained for a vintage feel. All pieces are finished with polyacrylic for durability. The numbers are hand-lettered in black. Dimensions are appx. 6 feet tall, 8 inches wide, 1 inch thick. 

Hanging your growth chart is easy with instructions included, along with two reccomended drywall screw anchors. Please note if you'd like a sawtooth hanger included as well. The numbers begin at the 6-inch mark, to allow for baseboards or carpet. If you'd like the board to start at a higher number, please send me a message. 

SHIPPING: Rulers are securely shipped within a 1-2 weeks of ordering via FedEx or UPS for $23, and are typically delivered in 3-5 business days - with tracking information provided.  A second ruler shipping to the same address is $5 more ($28 total) and is typically delivered in 5-7 business days.  

LOCAL pick up in the Austin area is available by using code LOCAL at checkout to zero shipping costs.  Buyer must arrange for a pickup in the NW Austin area.

Each ruler is an original. While the same stain and painting process is used every time, variations in the wood grain make each ruler unique. 

White Loft, LLC is not responsible for the nature or method for attaching growth chart ruler(s) to the wall and expressly disclaims all liability for any errors, improper hanging and/or attachment on a wall.  Adult supervision is recommended when using the growth chart ruler.

Please note: Due to the custom nature of these rulers, they are non-refundable.  
 
Shipping for this item is $23.  A second ruler shipping to the same address is an additional $5!

name: Growth Chart: Burlap/Jute
description:
This natural growth-chart provides a tangible way to watch your little one grow on a portable piece of decor. Ideal for a holiday gift, baby shower or addition to your home, 12 paper key tags and 12 safety pins are included to use as the height markers.

Made from 100% burlap/jute, the numbers and lines are hand-lettered in black ink. Dimensions are appx. 6 feet tall x 3.5 inches wide with red trim, as shown. Additional colors include purple, green and black! A rustic piece of twine is attached at the top, allowing the chart to hang on a wall.  

Additional photos (including colors) available at http://etsy.me/1a5Zg11

The numbers begin at the 6-inch mark, to allow for baseboards or carpet. If you'd like the growth chart to start at a different number, or be shorter in length - just let me know! 

SHIPPING: Growth charts are shipped within a 1-2 weeks of ordering via USPS. Shipping time is typically 5-7 business days.  If you're interested in Priority Mail, please let me know.

LOCAL PICK-UP in the Austin area is an option by using coupon code LOCAL at checkout to receive free shipping. Buyer is responsible to pick up the item in the NW Austin area. 

Packaged and ready to gift in a glass mason jar!

Shipping on this item is $8.

name: Crib Sheet: Mod Cars
description:
Very fun, yet modern fitted crib sheet has a gray background with a variety of cars, trucks and campers throughout. Beep beep!

This 100% cotton fitted crib sheet is designed to fit all U.S. standard-size crib/toddler mattresses (appx. 27.5 in. x 52 in.). The fabric has been pre-washed to reduce shrinkage and create extra softness. This sheet has a fully serged edge and fully cased elastic around the entire sheet to ensure a safe, snug fit. Handmade in a smoke-free environment.

Two available and READY TO SHIP within 1-3 business days of ordering, sent via USPS for $4. Expected delivery date is typically one week from ship date.

LOCAL PICK-UP in the Austin area is available by using code LOCAL at checkout, to remove shipping costs. Buyer is responsible to pick up the item in the NW Austin area.

Sending this as a gift? During final checkout at PayPal please leave "Notes for Seller" (link below shipping address). Enter the recipient's info (name and address) in “Notes to Seller.” I will wrap the gift in tissue paper with coordinating ribbon and a personalized card for no extra charge.

Sheet Care: Machine wash in cold water (no bleach!) and tumble dry on low.

Feel free to contact me for different fabrics or with any questions. I’m happy to help!

Shipping on this item is $4.

name: Custom Order Crib Sheets
description:
Interested in a perfect match for your little one's space? A custom order crib sheet is the way to go! 

Send me an email (ShopWhiteLoft [at] gmail.com) or see below:

HOW IT WORKS: At PayPal checkout, please leave details/requests for your order in "Notes for Seller" (link below shipping address). Suggested ideas are: gender, theme, colors, fabric type, etc. 

Upon receipt, I will respond within one week with details/photo of fabric options to choose from.  Upon your selection of fabric, turn around time is typically one to two weeks.  

SHIPPING: Shipped via USPS or UPS for $4, expected delivery date is typically one week from ship date. 

LOCAL PICK-UP in the Austin area is available by using code LOCAL at checkout, to remove shipping costs.  Buyer is responsible to pick up the item in the NW Austin area.

Designed to fit all U.S. standard-size crib/toddler mattresses (appx. 27.5 in. x 52 in.), all of White Loft's handmade fitted crib sheets have a fully serged edge and fully cased elastic around the entire sheet to ensure a safe, snug fit.  

All fabric is pre-washed to reduce shrinkage and create extra softness. Handmade in a smoke-free environment.

Sending this as a gift? During final checkout at PayPal please leave "Notes for Seller" (link below shipping address). Enter the recipient's info (name and address) in “Notes to Seller.” I will wrap the gift in tissue paper with coordinating ribbon and a personalized card for no extra charge.

Sheet Care: Machine wash in cold water (no bleach!) and tumble dry on low.

NOTE: If customer does not select from the fabric options provided, a full refund will be given.  Due to the custom nature of this item, once a fabric has been selected by the customer, they are non-refundable.   

Photos shown are previously sold items.  This listing is for one (1) crib sheet.  If interested in multiple sets, please email me.

Shipping on this item is $4.
